messages.description: Set the [S] sequence number used when generating filenames
Set the [B] batch number used when generating filenames
Request Smart Shooter to detect connected cameras
Do auto focus with specified camera
Drive liveview focus motor for specified camera
Change liveview zoom region for specified camera
Enable/disable liveview zoom region on specified camera
Enable/disable liveview DOF (depth of field) preview on specified camera
Enable/disable recording of liveview images on specified camera
Start/stop video recording on specified camera
Set camera property on specified camera
Download specified photo from camera to computer
Reshoot photo using same filename on specified camera
Format memory cards on all cameras
Retrieve current date/time from all cameras
Set desired liveview FPS for specified camera
Set shutter button state for specified camera
Force batch numbers back in sync for all cameras

fields.name: msg_type
fields.description: Indicates whether message is request/response or event

fields.description: Indicates the message contents

fields.description: Message reference number

fields.name: Result
fields.description: Generic result field indicating success or failure

fields.description: Location of photo file

fields.name: PhotoUUID
fields.description: Internal UUID of photo

fields.name: PhotoOriginalName
fields.description: Original name of photo on camera

fields.name: PhotoComputedName
fields.description: Photo name generated by Smart Shooter

fields.name: PhotoDateCaptured
fields.description: Data/time that photo was captured by camera

fields.name: PhotoFormat
fields.description: Format of photo image file

fields.name: PhotoWidth
fields.description: Width of photo

fields.name: PhotoHeight
fields.description: Height of photo

fields.name: PhotoFilesize
fields.description: Size of photo file

fields.name: PhotoIsImage
fields.description: Indicates whether photo is image or not (possible video file)

fields.name: PhotoHash
fields.description: Hash of photo data contents

fields.name: PhotoBarcode
fields.description: Contains barcode text scanned from photo

fields.name: PhotoIsScanned
fields.description: Indicates if barcode has been scanned from photo

fields.name: Enable
fields.description: Generic indicator for enabling/disabling some state

fields.name: CameraPropertyType
fields.description: Specifies a camera property

fields.name: CameraPropertyValue
fields.description: Contains value for the camera property

fields.name: CameraPropertyRange
fields.description: Array of valid values for a camera property

fields.name: CameraPropertyIsWriteable
fields.description: Indicates whether a camera property can be changed

fields.description: Indicates if camera supports auto focus

fields.name: CameraIsFocused
fields.description: Indicates of camera auto focus action was successful

fields.name: CameraLiveviewIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera supports liveview

fields.name: CameraLiveviewZoomIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera liveview supports a zoom region

fields.description: Indicates if camera liveview supports DOF (depth of field) preview

fields.name: CameraLiveviewIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether camera liveview is enabled

fields.name: CameraLiveviewZoomIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether camera liveview zoom region is enabled

fields.description: Indicates whether camera liveview DOF preview is enabled

fields.description: Indicates whether buld shooting mode is enabled

fields.name: CameraMirrorLockupIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether mirror lockup is enabled

fields.name: CameraPowersource
fields.description: Indicates camera power source

fields.name: CameraBatterylevel
fields.description: Indicates camera battery level in range 0 to 100

fields.name: CameraDownloadRate
fields.description: Transfer rate for last photo download in mbytes/sec
